DOC.brief_title: A Phase I/II Safety Study DE-120 Injectable Solution Age-related Macular Degeneration
DOC.detailed_description: This open-label , dose-escalating , sequential-cohort study DE-120 injectable solution administer 9 , 12 , subject late stage exudative age-related macular degeneration . Three cohort 3 subject receive single intravitreal injection study eye . Subjects Cohort 1 receive single intravitreal injection Low Dose DE-120 injectable solution study eye evaluate Visit 5 ( Month 1 ) . If Low Dose consider safe , next high dose administer Cohort 2 . The enrollment safety review procedure follow Cohort 2 ( Medium Dose DE-120 ) Cohort 3 ( High Dose DE-120 ) .
